title: Shroud

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose to attack or Shroud a player at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When Shrouding, you will deliver an Astral Basic Attack to any players that they visit that night.
- Shrouded players will appear to be a harmful visitor that night.
- You will not attack anyone if the Shrouded player doesn't visit.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill everyone who would oppose you.

desc:
Post 3894
*Nub died last night. They died protecting their target. They were also killed by a Bodyguard. Their role was Bodyguard.*
